ECG Feedback Report: Experiment #24B - Student: Alex Chen

Conclusion

Normal
Caution

Potential anomalies detected. Review required.

Re-measure Recommended

Evidence

Indicators Out of Range

Indicator Measured Ref Range Status
Heart Rate 95 bpm 60-100 bpm
P-wave Duration 120 ms <110 ms High
QT Interval 460 ms <440 ms (m) High

Flagged Categories

Attention Needed
Sinus Tachycardia Category 1: Rate Abnormalities
Prolonged QT Interval Category 3: Morphology

Reliability / Limitations

NOTE: This is a single-lead measurement. It is useful for rhythm analysis but cannot detect ischemia or localization of infarction. Signal noise was moderate.

Next Experiment Suggestions

  • Re-measure with changed posture (e.g., supine vs. seated).
  • Compare recordings before and after applying digital filtering.
  • Observe RR interval variation over a longer duration.
